passages.guidance: Questions 131-134 refer to the following notice.
passages.title: D-Zine Pop
passages.content:
D-Zine Pop is your source for information about the latest [131] in the world of fashion. What started asasocial media experiment intoacontent platform with subscribers in seventeen [132].

countries worldwide. We are constantly adding features to improve our user experience and share what apparel and clothing accessories are popular right now. We also make periodic updates to our terms of service. Subscribers' access to content is contingent upon consenting to these [133].

terms; therefore, we encourage you to review and accept them at dzinepop.com/privacy. Contact our customer service team at support@dzinepop.com if you have any questions. [134].

options.label: A
options.text:
Representatives are available 24 hours a day
to assist you.

options.label: B
options.text:
The changes made to our user privacy policy
are no longer effective.

options.label: C
options.text:
Fresh content is accessible through phone and
desktop apps.

options.label: D
options.text:
We are no longer offering a discounted rate if
you renew your subscription.

passages.guidance: Questions 135-138 refer to the following advertisement.
passages.title: Rescue your device with Phone Tune-Up
passages.content:
Is your smartphone screen scratched or cracked? [135]. ? Do your apps freeze or crash? The experts at Phone Tune-Up can help! We use nothing but the best quality parts to your [136].

mobile phone. Let our certified technicians save you the time and expense involved in replacing your phone withanew one. When we are [137]. , you will think your old phone is brand new. To make an appointment, call 604-555-0198 or visit www.phonetuneup.com. Same-day service is often available needed parts are in stock.

[138].

options.label: A
options.text:
Does your printer need frequent ink
refills?

options.label: B
options.text:
Does it take all day for your battery to
recharge?

options.label: C
options.text:
Do you want to complete a short
survey?

options.label: D
options.text:
Do you pay too much for your data
plan?

passages.guidance: Questions 139-142 refer to the following press release.
passages.title: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
passages.content:
SACRAMENTO (July 28)â€”The Sacramento-based supermarket chain Hsing Market announced today that it is openingabranch in San Jose in October. It will occupy the building that [139].

once housed the Watson Office Superstore located at 1539 West Oak Street, which closed last year.

Hsing Market CEO Alice Tran said, "We are very excited to openastore in San Jose.

[140].

When the Watson building became available, we jumped on the opportunity to move in." [141].

Asaneighborhood grocery store, Hsing Market prides itself on hiring applicants from the local community. Approximately 75 percent of all employees live within two miles of the store where they [142].

options.label: A
options.text:
The store features a variety of
fresh and prepared foods.

options.label: B
options.text:
We hope that you will be able to
join us at our grand-opening
celebration.

options.label: C
options.text:
We have had our eyes on the
city for quite some time.

options.label: D
options.text:
Our corporate headquarters will
be renovated soon.

passages.guidance: Questions 143-146 refer to the following Web page information.
passages.title: About Leafi Cloth
passages.content:
Tropick Textiles recently expanded the of fabrics available on the market. In its quest to [143].

introduce environmentally friendly alternatives to cotton and other traditional fibers, the company a new fiber made from materials that are typically discarded. Tropick Textiles takes banana [144].

and pineapple leaves and combines them with bamboo fibers to create Leafi Cloth. The plants' leaves are ordinarily disposed of the fruit is harvested. Tropick Textiles' process prevents [145].

many leaves from enteringalandfill, converting them instead into usable material. [146].

options.label: A
options.text:
The resulting durable fabric is a suitable
substitute for cotton cloth.

options.label: B
options.text:
Inquiries regarding Leafi Cloth were
directed to the sales department.

options.label: C
options.text:
Tropick Textiles will celebrate its
one-hundredth anniversary this year.

options.label: D
options.text:
Manufacturing costs have been
increasing for Tropick Textiles lately.
